Name: Fist Method: Rainbow Butterflies
Desc:
[Scroll Magic] Opens a scroll to summon beautiful, but lethal five-colored butterflies. A butterfly that tracks and attacks the enemy is summoned for a set amount of time.
Fist Method: Rainbow Butterflies does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status and prioritizes the Boss monster with the highest Max HP.

Desc.Old:
[Scroll Magic] Opens a scroll to summon beautiful, but lethal five-colored butterflies. A butterfly that tracks and attacks the enemy is summoned for a set amount of time.

Fist Method: Rainbow Butterflies does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status and prioritizes tracking Boss monsters with the highest Max HP.
Desc.New:
[Scroll Magic] Opens a scroll to summon beautiful, but lethal five-colored butterflies. A butterfly that tracks and attacks the enemy is summoned for a set amount of time.
Fist Method: Rainbow Butterflies does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status and prioritizes the Boss monster with the highest Max HP.

H.Old:
Scroll Power cost: 900. Summons 5 butterflies that increase Final Damage by 10% for 100 sec. and deal damage at 297% when attacking.
However, butterflies can't be summoned again for 1 sec. after being summoned once.
Fist Method: Dooming Light damage +400%p

and attacks at 297% Damage for 100 sec.
Butterflies can't be re-summoned for 1 sec.
